newsitem.title: USA: Pottsville SD 61, Ark., won by Prudential.
newsitem.headline: Pottsville SD 61, Ark., won by Prudential.

text.p: Prudential Securities Inc said it won $2.085 million of Pottsville School District 61, Ark., refunding and construction limited tax bonds, with a net interest cost of 5.66 percent.
